descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Jarrett Allen sends Jae'Sean Tate to the floor after denying his big dunk attempt.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jarrett Allen offended Jae'Sean Tate tried to dunk on him) 2021/12/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jarrett Allen offended Jae'Sean Tate tried to dunk on him

videos.description: Ricky Rubio scores with four seconds left, then comes up with a steal and behind-the-back dime to Ed Davis to beat the buzzer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Rubio beats the horn in style with pickpocket steal, flashy dime) 2021/12/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Rubio beats the horn in style with pickpocket steal, flashy dime

videos.description: Darius Garland extends the Cavaliers' big lead with a layup at the buzzer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Garland scoops it home to beat halftime buzzer) 2021/12/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Garland scoops it home to beat halftime buzzer

videos.description: D.J. Augustin argues with the referees and is thrown out of the game after picking up two quick technical fouls.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (D.J. Augustin gets ejected from the game) 2021/12/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: D.J. Augustin gets ejected from the game

videos.description: Josh Christopher lobs it up high to Kenyon Martin Jr. for the impressive alley-oop.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kenyon Martin Jr. skies for lefty alley-oop) 2021/12/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kenyon Martin Jr. skies for lefty alley-oop
